abstract.t: This document specifies how to interconnect multiple Transparent Interconnection of Lots of links (TRILL) sites which are separated by MPLS network using existing TRILL and VPLS standards. This draft addresses two problems 1) Providing connection between more than two TRILL sites that are separated by MPLS provider network. 2) Providing single logical virtualized TRILL network for different tenants that are separated by MPLS provider network.
